thread.title: Video From 2013 North Dakota Train Collision

author: Juggernaut
title: Video From 2013 North Dakota Train Collision
text:
Browse Channels Video From 2013 North Dakota Train Collision 
Casselton, ND - The National Transportation Safety Board has released video taken from the locomotive of an oil train that collided with a derailed grain train near Casselton, ND in Dec. 2013. Collision at 2:30 mark The NTSB is holding a hearing today to announce the cause of the derailment and to recommend changes in how train components are inspected. NTSB Chairman Christopher Hart says investigators determined that a broken axle from the derailment was caused by a "manufacturing defect."
